REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2824 reute u f BC-IMPERIAL-<ICA>-DECLAR 03-30 0046

TEXT.TITLE: IMPERIAL <ICA> DECLARES FIRST DIV SINCE 1981
TEXT.BODY: Imperial Corp of America said it declared a 10 cts dividend and four pct stock dividend on APril 25 to holders of record April 10. This is the first dividend payment since 1981, the company said. Reuter
